wogwt.translatable.http
Interface AfterDOMUpdateCallback

public interface AfterDOMUpdateCallback

A simple callback used with the Updater classes to allow for custom actions after an HTTP request and response modifies the DOM. This is mainly used to re-attach event listeners to the portion of the DOM that was replaced.

Method Summary
 void afterDOMUpdate(java.lang.Object sender, java.lang.String url, Response response)
           
 

Method Detail

afterDOMUpdate

void afterDOMUpdate(java.lang.Object sender,
                    java.lang.String url,
                    Response response)
Parameters:
sender - either the Widget or Element that triggered the callback
url - of the HTTP request that resulted in the DOM update
response - of the HTTP request for url
